Articles.Content:
The game keeps crashing and deleting all my save data on Xbox one. It keeps happening over and over. Doesn't matter what mode I'm in. Goes back to one of the first saves. I love the game and am just letting u guys know so it can be looked after. Thank you for bringing KSP to Xbox. The bug hasn't stopped me though . I'm getting prity pro lol.... ahhh the inventions :D. Whel that's it that's all. I hear of a patch in the works already but thought ide let you know anyway. Thanks again for KSP!! You guys rock.          Ps. Please give us stuff to make helicopters please please Please!!!!      PPS... I...... think I    I love u  ha ha ha jk jk but the game yes

Edited August 19, 2016 by Mcluvin
To be funny
